alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 01 at 3:19PM CDT until September 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM UNTIL 8 PM FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS AND MUCH OF SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS AND MUCH OF SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Beauregard, Allen, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Tyler, Hardin, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper, Southern Newton, Upper Jefferson, Northern Orange, Lower Jefferson and Southern Orange. * TIMING...10 AM until 8 PM CDT. * WINDS...Northeast 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 90s. * LIGHTNING...None. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Burn bans are in effect across Louisiana and Southeast Texas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson
